channel.title: UMDCTF on drMoscovium
channel.description: Recent content in UMDCTF on drMoscovium

item.title: UMDCTF: Block ChainV2 - Chungus Coin
item.description: For this challenge we were provided with the server.py with stuffs redacted. They made their own coin called ChungusCoin, this challenge was combination of reverse engineering and bitcoin. As usual, starting the challenge out by analyzing the code that was provided. There is a lot going in the code. The description of the challenge says it’s for people who know how to mine. So, time to figure out how to mine this code.

item.title: UMDCTF: Customer Support
item.description: For this challenge we were given So I stared out by opening the Dockerfile In the docker file we can see the starting command is npm run startall Looking at the package.json we can see two service being started with start all script. In app.js inside microservice we can see two path that returns token. This microservice is running in port 3001. The first thing that I tried to do was open that port, but i couldn’t access it.
